verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> I Paul <S%G3972><s%> myself beseech <S%G3870><s%> you by the meekness <S%G4236><s%> and gentleness <S%G1932><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> in presence <S%G4383><s%> am base <S%G5011><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, but being absent <S%G548><s%> am bold <S%G2292><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> you:

But I beseech <S%G1189><s%> you, that I may not be bold <S%G2292><s%> when I am present <S%G3918><s%> with that confidence, <S%G4006><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> I think <S%G3049><s%> to be bold <S%G5111><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> some, <S%G5100><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> think <S%G3049><s%> of us as if we walked <S%G4043><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh. <S%G4561><s%>
For though we walk <S%G4043><s%> in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> we do not war <S%G4754><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh: <S%G4561><s%>

(For the weapons <S%G3696><s%> of our warfare <S%G4752><s%> are not carnal, <S%G4559><s%> but mighty <S%G1415><s%> through God <S%G2316><s%> to the pulling <S%G2506><s%> down <S%G2506><s%> of strong <S%G3794><s%> holds; <S%G3794><s%>)

Casting <S%G2507><s%> down <S%G2506><s%> imaginations, <S%G3053><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> high <S%G5313><s%> thing <S%G5313><s%> that exalts <S%G1869><s%> itself against <S%G2596><s%> the knowledge <S%G1108><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and bringing <S%G163><s%> into captivity <S%G163><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> thought <S%G3540><s%> to the obedience <S%G5218><s%> of Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

And having <S%G2192><s%> in a readiness <S%G2092><s%> to revenge <S%G1556><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> disobedience, <S%G3876><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> obedience <S%G5218><s%> is fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

Do you look <S%G991><s%> on <S%G991><s%> things after <S%G2596><s%> the outward <S%G4383><s%> appearance? <S%G4383><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man trust <S%G3982><s%> to himself <S%G1438><s%> that he is Christ's, <S%G5547><s%> let him of himself <S%G1438><s%> think <S%G3049><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> that, as he is Christ's, <S%G5547><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> are we Christ's. <S%G5547><s%>

For though <S%G1437><s%> I should boast <S%G2744><s%> somewhat <S%G5100><s%> more <S%G4055><s%> of our authority, <S%G1849><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> has given <S%G1325><s%> us for edification, <S%G3619><s%> and not for your <S%G5216><s%> destruction, <S%G2506><s%> I should not be ashamed: <S%G153><s%>
That I may not seem <S%G1380><s%> as if I would terrify <S%G1629><s%> you by letters. <S%G1992><s%>

For his letters, <S%G1992><s%> say <S%G5346><s%> they, are weighty <S%G926><s%> and powerful; <S%G2478><s%> but his bodily <S%G4983><s%> presence <S%G3952><s%> is weak, <S%G770><s%> and his speech <S%G3056><s%> contemptible. <S%G1848><s%>

Let such <S%G3634><s%> an one think <S%G3049><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> that, such <S%G5108><s%> as we are in word <S%G3056><s%> by letters <S%G1992><s%> when we are absent, <S%G548><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> will we be also <S%G2532><s%> in deed <S%G2041><s%> when we are present. <S%G3918><s%>

For we dare <S%G5111><s%> not make ourselves <S%G1438><s%> of the number, <S%G1469><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> compare <S%G4793><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%> with some <S%G5100><s%> that commend <S%G4921><s%> themselves: <S%G1438><s%> but they measuring <S%G3354><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> by themselves, <S%G1438><s%> and comparing <S%G4793><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> among themselves, <S%G1438><s%> are not wise. <S%G4920><s%>

But we will not boast <S%G2744><s%> of things without <S%G280><s%> our measure, <S%G280><s%> but according <S%G2596><s%> to the measure <S%G3358><s%> of the rule <S%G2583><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has distributed <S%G3307><s%> to us, a measure <S%G3358><s%> to reach <S%G2185><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to you.

For we stretch <S%G5239><s%> not ourselves <S%G1438><s%> beyond <S%G5239><s%> our measure, as though we reached <S%G2185><s%> not to you: for we are come <S%G5348><s%> as far <S%G891><s%> as to you also <S%G2532><s%> in preaching <S%G2782><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

Not boasting <S%G2744><s%> of things without <S%G280><s%> our measure, <S%G280><s%> that is, of other <S%G245><s%> men's labors; <S%G2873><s%> but having <S%G2192><s%> hope, <S%G1680><s%> when your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> is increased, <S%G837><s%> that we shall be enlarged <S%G3170><s%> by you according <S%G2596><s%> to our rule <S%G2583><s%> abundantly, <S%G1519><s%>

To preach <S%G2097><s%> the gospel <S%G2097><s%> in the regions beyond <S%G5238><s%> you, and not to boast <S%G2744><s%> in another <S%G245><s%> man's <S%G245><s%> line <S%G2583><s%> of things made <S%G2092><s%> ready <S%G2092><s%> to our hand.
But he that glories, <S%G2744><s%> let him glory <S%G2744><s%> in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
For not he that commends <S%G4921><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> is approved, <S%G1384><s%> but whom <S%G3739><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> commends. <S%G4921><s%>
